thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: What Volatile Market? Growth-Fund Managers Strut

author: Suzanne McGee
title: What Volatile Market? Growth-Fund Managers Strut
text:
The first three months of 2018 were a volatile period, culminating in the S&P 500’s first quarterly loss since mid-2015.
But behind the scenes, some disciplined mutual-fund managers who focus on “growth” stocks—those powered by corporate-earnings potential—continue to rack up gains. In fact, they are dominating, led by the $2.5 billion Virtus KAR Small-Cap Growth Fund (PXSGX), which has won The Wall Street Journal’s latest Winners’ Circle contest of the best-performing U.S.-stock fund managers. It returned 40.8% in the
